Html:
On sys_get_temp_dir I have 0777 and on Shared directory 0777, but phpExcel generate xls-file with this content. Any idea how to resolve this problem?
<br /><b>Fatal error</b>:  Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Can't create temporary file' in /var/www/admin/data/www/test.su/availability/phpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php:98
Stack trace:
#0 /var/www/admin/data/www/test.su/availability/phpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5.php(198): PHPExcel_Shared_OLE_PPS_File->init()
#1 /var/www/admin/data/www/test.su/availability/getXLS.php(40): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5->save('php://output')
#2 {main}  thrown in <b>/var/www/admin/data/www/test.su/availability/phpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php</b> on line <b>98</b><br />
What version of PHPExcel are you running? Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php hasn't existed since PHPExcel 1.7.2. The latest version is 1.7.6, and this problem was fixed several versions ago.
My fault, it was 1.7.1. Try 1.7.6, it work's perfect. Thank's a lot.
